revised_title: The Impact of Local Attraction on Geodesy and the Determination of the Earth's Mean Figure
tldr: The author investigates the impact of local attraction on geodesy and the determination of the Earth's mean figure, proposing a method to obtain the mean figure free from ambiguity by comparing the Anglo-Gallic, Russian, and Indian arcs. The paper also discusses the effect of local attraction on mapping a country and the determination of the mean figure of the Earth.
